name: Flappy Rocket 3D
description:
Cruise your 3d rocket through buildings without crashing.

Pass through an endless array of obstacles and make your highest score possible.

Get it on Google Play Store here and play without ads:

Flappy Rocket 3d

Instructions to play:

Just tap to play (on mobile) OR Press Space to play (in web mode)

Hope you love it !! 

Please do share feedback and reviews.

Also follow us on below platforms:
